### `learnr` in action!

Q1) Use a function to round the number 19.4479 to the third decimal place

<details>
<summary style = "color:gray"></summary>

```{r Q1, exercise=TRUE}

```
```{r Q1-solution}
round(x = 19.4479, digits = 3)
```
```{r Q1-check}
ex() %>% check_function("round") %>% {
  check_arg(., "x") %>% check_equal()
  check_arg(., "digits") %>% check_equal()
}
success_msg("Great job, I knew you'd get a-ROUND to it!")
```

</details>
